channel.title: Chaves County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Chaves County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-380 East at NM-409
item.description: US-380 east at NM-409 south to Bottomless Lakes State Park.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-256
item.description: US-380 east at NM-256 junction (Atkinson Ave.)

item.title: US-380 East at Main St.
item.description: US-380 east at Main St. Turn right for Main St. south to US-285/Artesia; turn left for Main St. to US-285/Vaughn. Continue east for US-380 to Tatum.

item.title: US-380 West at Main St.
item.description: US-380 west at Main St. Turn right for Main St. (to US-285 North) to Vaughn. Turn left for Main St. (to US-285 South) to Artesia. Continue west for US-380 (to US-70) to Ruidoso.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380. Turn right on US-380 east for Tatum, left on US-380 west (to US-70 west) for Ruidoso. Continue north on Main St. for US-285 north to Vaughn.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 and Main St. before the Relief Route was completed.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 through Roswell until the Roswell Relief Route was completed. Main St. was the former route of US-285, although there are still US-285 markers along Main St.

item.title: US-285 North - Roswell Relief Route
item.description: US-285 north at the southern end of the Roswell Relief Route. For US-285 North, US-380 West, and US-70, this is the truck route around the city. Officially, US-285 runs along the relief route, although there are US-285 markers along the old segment through Roswell.

item.title: US-285 North at NM-2
item.description: US-285 north at NM-2 south to Dexter. Continue north on US-285 for Roswell.

item.title: US-285 North Approaching NM-2
item.description: US-285 north approaching NM-2 South to Dexter. US-285 continues north towards Roswell.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-13
item.description: US-82 east at NM-13 to Roswell and Hagerman. Continue east on US-82 to Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-24
item.description: US-82 east at NM-24 south to Dunken. Continue east on US-82 for Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching NM-24
item.description: US-82 east approaching NM-24 junction, in rural Chaves County.
